title: The One Where Lala Plays Mrs. Claus
description:
It’s the most wonderful time of the year, and Lala and Jessica are talking holiday traditions, gift giving, favorite Christmas songs, most memorable childhood presents, sledding, and dreams of being Mrs. Claus! Lala also answers your voicemails about the importance of good communication with your partner, financial independence, following your dreams, and believing in yourself. Plus, wishes and hopes for 2022!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
